subject: Re: Help on testing EJBs
msgSnippet: When I run jUnit from the command prompt, i get the error: Cannot instantiate class: weblogic.jndi.TengahInitialContextFactory or Cannot instantiate class:
messageBody:
When I run jUnit from the command prompt, i get the error:

Cannot instantiate class: weblogic.jndi.TengahInitialContextFactory
or
Cannot instantiate class: weblogic.jndi.WLInitialContextFactory

depending on if I used Brian or Jim's code. ?????

i still get the error mentioned in my last post when I run the code
in my debugger (VisualCafe)

Thanks,
Luis


> Thanks Brian and Jim. I tried each of your code, and now I am
> getting the following error. It looks like it wants to throw a
> JSAFE_InvalidUseException error, which I have never seen before.
Any
> ideas what would cause this...possible remedies?
>
> Thanks Again!!
> Luis
